props.xfLabel: Outside areas kept neat and clean?
Are storm drains inlets labeled and maintained?
Are employees trained on an on-going basis?
Are unpaved outdoor areas protected from water and wind erosion?
Is area designed to prevent run-on of stormwater and run-off of spills?

props.xfToggleLabel: Any deficiencies for Contaminated or Erodible Surface Areas (IC6)?

props.xfLabel: Is the dirt/debris from landscaped areas contained?
Materials prevented from being tracked from inside areas?
Are materials/wastes stored away from doors/docks?

props.xfToggleLabel: Any deficiencies for Outdoor Drainage from Indoor Areas (IC9)?

props.xfLabel: Are the loading dock areas maintained?
Is exposure of activities to rain limited?
Are drip pans available to catch potential leaks?

props.xfToggleLabel: Any deficiencies for Outdoor Loading/Unloading of Materials (IC10)?

props.xfLabel: Outdoor Storage of Raw Materials, Products, and Containers (IC12)
Are materials stored off the ground (i.e. palletized)?

props.xfToggleLabel: Any deficiencies for Outdoor Storage of Raw Materials, Products, and Containers (IC12)?
Any deficiencies for Parking and Storage Area Maintenance (IC15)?

props.xfLabel: Are spill containment and cleanup materials readily available?
Are absorbent materials removed and properly disposed of in a timely manner?

props.xfToggleLabel: Any deficiencies for Spill Prevention and Cleanup (IC17)?

props.xfLabel: Vehicle/Equipment Maintenance, Fueling, Repair, and Washing (IC18-20)
Are leaks and drips cleaned in a timely manner?
Are maintenance, fueling, repair, and washing areas designated and contained?

props.xfToggleLabel: Any deficiencies for Vehicle/Equipment Maintenance, Fueling, Repair, and Washing (IC18-20)?

props.xfLabel: Horse Waste Management and Wash Rack (IC21)
Is wash water contained and disposed of?
Are feed storage bins away from waterways?
Is manure picked up regularly, preferably daily?
Is manure being stored on an impervious surface, under cover to prevent runoff contamination and away from waterways?
Is trash enclosure clean and maintained?

props.xfToggleLabel: Any deficiencies for Horse Waste Management and Wash Rack (IC21)?
